function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sparse coverage of service robot data","Impact":"Limited understanding of the usage of service robots in various industries and countries, hindering informed decision-making","Mitigation":"Conduct research to fill the gaps in service robot data, improve data collection methods, and increase transparency in reporting robot usage","Technologies":"Improved data collection tools, automation of data processing, and standardized reporting mechanisms","People":"Researchers, data analysts, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, international organizations"},{"Description":"Inequality in income and wage distribution","Impact":"Exacerbation of economic disparities, potential for unequal access to resources and healthcare during pandemics","Mitigation":"Implement policies that address income inequality, provide equal access to healthcare, and support vulnerable populations during pandemics","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying inequality patterns, digital platforms for resource allocation, and policy management tools","People":"Government policymakers, public health officials, social welfare organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, nonprofit organizations, international aid organizations"},{"Description":"Pandemic events (SARS, H1N1, MERS, Ebola)","Impact":"Significant loss of life and economic disruption, potential for rapid contagion and global spread of diseases","Mitigation":"Develop and implement robust public health measures, invest in healthcare infrastructure, and enhance international cooperation in disease prevention and control","Technologies":"Vaccines and biopharmaceutical research, disease surveillance systems, telemedicine and remote healthcare technologies","People":"Public health authorities, healthcare workers, global health organizations","Owner":"National and international public health agencies, pharmaceutical companies, research institutions"}]}
